msbt.message: You have real pretty colors, little clown fish!Don't be scared! It's all cool. I don't eat clown fish.I've made that snack time mistake before!
This anchovy is so little! The way their blue backs catch the light is real prettyThey're horrible on pizza, though.<10_4 /> If you disagree, I WILL bite you.
The way the sea butterfly flutters is so cool! It looks like they're flying!
The red and white on koi is pretty! Makes 'em look like big fish-shaped tubes of candy!
This guppy is real small. You could fit a bunch in your hand. <10_4 />Just like popcorn.
The flowy fins on betta make it look like they're wearing beautiful dresses.
Check it out! The surgeonfish's yellow tail makes it look like he's wearing little yellow shoes!
Stringfish They're not stringy though. Pretty tender, actually
Blathers said this is a "living fossil"? How can it be living if it's a fossil?<10_4 /> Oh man! It's swimming! WHAAAAT?!
Man, Napoleonfish have tiny little eyes, and big crazy foreheads! Just look at it! So crazy big!
Ocean sunfish are kindascary? But also tasty? But also scary?
This whale shark looks like a vacuum cleaner with that big mouth! Vrooom! A huh huh!
Arowana are so big! And their scales are so shiny! And pretty!<10_4 /> I wanna know what one tastes like!
Coelacanth look like they're wearing armor! Maybe they're gonna go slay a dragon!Or maybe that armor's like a can, keeping them fresh to eat!
Char have got polka dots all over their bodies! Those dots look like candy. Delicious fish-flavored candy.
Didja know that it takes 500 piranha about 5 seconds to eat 180 pounds of pizza?!I know lotsa eating facts.
This great white shark is pretty big but its eyes are real, real small Man, I bet my eyes are bigger!
Mahi-mahi rule the seas, 'cause they're so big and sparkly!
Oarfish look like origami come to life!<10_4 /> Tasty, tasty origami.
So, the sturgeon isn't a shark, but folks think it is? Man, I'm jealous!
The gar's scales are super hard! Man, I bet it'd really hurt if it tackled me!
The hammerhead shark's so cool! I say "hammer" when I hammer things! Hammerhammerhammer
Hey, ! I can't believe you caught this fish! Blathers has been telling everybody about it!
